paragraph1: You have successfully signed into your MyHMCTS account. Unfortunately, your account role does not allow you to access the verified user part of the Court and tribunal hearings service
paragraph2: Solicitors and other legal professionals are the only users allowed to sign in with a MyHMCTS account. For more information about MyHMCTS the link below:
linkText: MyHMCTS: online case management for legal professionals
paragraph3: Alternatively, please click Home to return to the public version of the Court and tribunals hearings Service.
